subject: Meeting tomorrow at 3pm
body: Hi team, reminder about our meeting tomorrow.
label: legitimate

subject: URGENT: Your account will be suspended
body: Click here immediately to verify your account or it will be closed.
label: phishing

subject: Q3 Report attached
body: Please find the quarterly report attached for your review.
label: legitimate

subject: You've won $1,000,000!
body: Congratulations! Click to claim your prize now before it expires!
label: phishing

subject: Project deadline reminder
body: Just a reminder that the project is due Friday.
label: legitimate

subject: Verify your identity NOW
body: Your bank account has been compromised. Enter credentials here.
label: phishing

subject: Team lunch Friday
body: Who's joining for team lunch this Friday? Let me know.
label: legitimate

subject: Act fast - Limited time offer
body: Special discount just for you! Click now before offer expires!
label: phishing

subject: Code review requested
body: Can you review the PR when you have a chance?
label: legitimate

subject: Security alert: Unusual login
body: We detected unusual activity. Verify by clicking this link.
label: phishing
